en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Upgrade now to access performance improvements and snappier interactions (i.e., less lag), lower CPU usage, and faster launch times.

en.title: Welcome to your new sidebar
en.description: Your sidebar just got better. New updates include custom collapsible categories, drag-and-drop organization, unread channel filtering and more.

en.title: New server version available
en.description: This new release includes bug fixes for increased stability and some important notices for upcoming product changes and events. [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/upgrade/upgrading-mattermost-server.html) only takes a few minutes.

en.title: Introducing custom statuses
en.description: Setting a custom status lets you express your status in any way you prefer by adding a descriptive status message and emoji that’s visible to everyone throughout the app.

en.title: Collapsed Reply Threads are here, get early access to the beta
en.description:
You can now enable an early beta of Collapsed Reply Threads in **Account Settings** > **Display** > **Collapsed Reply Threads (Beta)**

Please [review the list of known issues](https://docs.mattermost.com/messaging/organizing-conversations.html#known-issues) as we work towards stabilizing the feature.

en.title: Collapsed Reply Threads are here, get early access to the beta
en.description:
You can now enable an early beta of Collapsed Reply Threads for this workspace in **System Console** > **Experimental** > **Collapsed Reply Threads (Beta)**

Please [review the list of known issues](https://docs.mattermost.com/messaging/organizing-conversations.html#known-issues) as we work towards stabilizing the feature.

en.title: Share your first impressions and get a $50 gift card
en.description: Thank you for trying Mattermost. We’d love to chat with you and see how you like it so far! For 30 minutes of your time, we will gift you a $50 USD gift card. If interested, simply schedule 30 minutes using the link below.
